intro.para1: Hello! I'm Helder, a product designer with over 20 years of experience at the intersection of branding and UX/UI. I help founders and companies bring new ideas to life with a focus on usability, visual design, and meaningful interactions.
intro.para2: I've worked with startups and established companies across healthcare, education, and consumer products. Scroll down to see selected projects or contact me to discuss your next project.

about.para1: My approach blends strategic thinking with a keen eye for aesthetics and usability. I believe great products solve real problems in ways that feel intuitive and delightful. My process focuses on understanding user needs, business goals, and technical constraints to create solutions that work on all levels.
about.para2: I'm currently available for new projects and collaborations. If you'd like to work together, please reach out at hello@helder.design or connect with me on LinkedIn.
